text: Manlio Hedair Badaró (April 23, 1933 – November 1, 2008) was a Portuguese actor and comedian. Born in Brazil, Badaró moved to Portugal in 1957. He came over as part of the comedy group "Brasileira Fogo no Pandeiro." Once he restarted his career in Portugal he started to appear in several plays including "Empresta-me o teu apartamento" with actress Alina Vaz.Badaró não resistiu a um cancro (Portuguese) Jornal de Notícias During an interview in May 2008 Badaró said "I have so many health problems that they have lost count: suffered a heart attack, a stroke, had a lymphoma and now I have discovered another cancer".
